thread.title: Sixers trade Nerlens Noel to Mavericks for Andrew Bogut, Justin Anderson and 1st round pick
thread.title_full: Sixers trade Nerlens Noel to Mavericks for Andrew Bogut, Justin Anderson and 1st round pick

author: Matt Ellentuck
title: Sixers trade Nerlens Noel to Mavericks for Andrew Bogut, Justin Anderson and 1st round pick
text:
This came out of nowhere.
The Philadelphia 76ers are sending Nerlens Noel to the Dallas Mavericks for Justin Anderson and a first-round pick, according to the Verticalâ€™s Adrian Wojnarowski . 
The Sixers trade focus was originally on shipping Jahlil Okafor, who was told to stay home for two road games before the All-Star break with a trade imminent. It is not yet known if this means Okafor could stay in Philly after all.
This story will be updated.
